trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>事件時的 [更新] 按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 更新 」) 控制項內按一下時，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控制更新的記錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查更新作業的結果，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormViewUpdatedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 FormViewUpdatedEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入此事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
